text: Geertruida "Ruud" Maria Geels (; 28 July 1948 – 18 November 2023) was a Dutch professional footballer who played as a striker. Geels died in 18 November 2023, at the age of 75. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League League League Cup Cup Europe Europe Other
